data.name: Configuration settings - just use a map
data.description:
# Save configuration settings

A configuration class exists which saves entries in a map using the some magic configurationwords as keys.

```
config['TargetURLString'] = "foo.bar.com";
config['TimeoutInMs'] = 1000;
```

The class Configuration will be initialized with values from another map.
```
std::map<std::string,std::string> InitValuesMap;
[...]
Configuration config(InitValuesMap);
```

Fix the method ```std::map<std::string, int> getConfigValues( const std::list<string> keys )``` so it will return a map with all entries specified by the content of list keys.

Be sure to only add valid entries.
